articles.author: Connie Loizos
articles.title: The phone is dead. Long live . . . what exactly? - TechCrunch
articles.description: "We're not going to be using iPhones in 10 years," Callaghan says flatly. "I kind of don't think we'll be using them in five years."
articles.content:
True Ventures co-founder Jon Callaghan doesn’t think we’ll be using smartphones the way we do now in five years — and maybe not at all in 10.
For a venture capitalist whose firm has had some big win… [+6733 chars]

articles.author: Angela Miele
articles.title: Shocking Orange Bowl Ticket Prices Days Before Oregon vs. Texas Tech - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The No. 5 Oregon Ducks and No. 4 Texas Tech Red Raiders will face off in the College Football Playoff quarterfinals. The Orange Bowl will take place at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Florida, and the ticket prices are trending down ahead of the game.
articles.content: The No. 5 Oregon Ducks and No. 4 Texas Tech Red Raiders will face off in the College Football Playoff quarterfinals on Jan. 1. The matchup will take place at Hard Rock Stadium in Miami Gardens, Flori… [+4584 chars]
